rows.label: tev011301_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011301_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Jeffrey about indigens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011301_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011301_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Jeffrey if anything is troubling him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011301_SEL0031
rows.name:
Ask Jeffrey for his thoughts on
the xenoforms that live in NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011301_SEL0041
rows.name:
Ask Jeffrey for his thoughts on
the xenoforms that live in NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011301_MSG0001
rows.name:
There are numerous giant, dinosaur-like creatures on
this planet. It's like we've gone back in time to the
Jurassic period.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011301_MSG0003
rows.name:
But the word "dinosaur" doesn't really capture the wide
variety of primordial life here. So we mostly refer to
them as "indigenous creatures," or "indigens" for short.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011301_MSG0004
rows.name:
I've been studying them with a BLADE operative named
Vera in our spare time. She actually used to be a
colleague of mine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011301_MSG0005
rows.name:
So far, all we've learned is that they're substantially
different from the species we knew back on Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011301_MSG0006
rows.name: Are you a BLADE yourself?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011301_MSG0007
rows.name:
If you are, it would really help our research if you
could bring samples from the indigens you kill during
your missions. So please consider it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011301_MSG0010
rows.name:
The primary focus of my research is biological materials
with highly venomous or pathogenic properties.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011301_MSG0011
rows.name:
But at the moment, I've run into a bit of a problem:
Our freezers are full, and I'm not sure how to dispose
of toxic samples I no longer need.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011301_MSG0012
rows.name:
I mean, I can't just have the waste-management center
dispose of toxic organs and isolated diseases as if they
were old paper cups![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011301_MSG0013
rows.name:
Apparently there are businesses here in New LA that
will illegally dump waste somewhere on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011301_MSG0014
rows.name:
But a researcher for BLADE command can't turn to such
disreputable elements. The whole situation is beginning
to make my head hurt.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011301_MSG0022
rows.name:
When they arrived here at New LA, we used a
quarantine kit to make sure they didn't have any
unusual or dangerous diseases.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011301_MSG0023
rows.name:
But that's all the research we've done on the xenoforms.
We know essentially nothing about them otherwise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011301_MSG0024
rows.name:
If you want to know about xenoforms, you shouldn't
waste your time talking to me. You should ask Vera,
who's up on the Ma-non ship.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011301_MSG0025
rows.name:
She has so much passion for her research that she
leaves the BLADE barracks to study xenoforms on a
regular basis.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011301_MSG0026
rows.name:
She's basically my exact oppositeâ€”I much prefer to stay
shut up safe in my lab. Anyway, I'm sure she could tell
you something useful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011301_MSG0041
rows.name:
When they arrived here at New LA, we used a
quarantine kit to make sure they didn't have any
unusual or dangerous diseases.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011301_MSG0042
rows.name:
But that's all the research we've done on the xenoforms.
We know essentially nothing about them otherwise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011301_MSG0043
rows.name:
If you want to know about xenoforms, you shouldn't
waste your time talking to me. You should ask Vera,
who's up on the Ma-non ship.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011301_MSG0044
rows.name:
I hear that she's recently become extremely close with
a Zaruboggan named Orleron.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011301_MSG0045
rows.name:
I bet she's learned all SORTS of things she never could
have figured out with conventional research methods![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011301_MSG0046
rows.name:
Or perhaps I'm just jealous. I only ever viewed her as
a research colleague, but now that she's spending all
her time with someone else...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011301_MSG0047
rows.name:
Well, it makes me realize that I've probably been in
love with her this whole time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011301_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Jeffrey about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011301_MSG0048
rows.name:
Our mimeosomes keep us safe for now. But when we
return to our real bodies, it's possible that we could all
be wiped out by a single germ or contaminant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011301_MSG0049
rows.name:
That's why I'm trying to gather and research all of the
potential toxins and pathogens on this planet. It's the
only way we humans can be confident in our safety.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011301_MSG0050
rows.name:
And if we do find anything, I hope we can get
Shiraton and his friends to purify it for us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011301_MSG0051
rows.name:
Humanity has made some pretty valuable friends here
on New LA. It might be what saves us from extinction.[ST:wait ]
